markdown:
[Ghiono](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2440) **Source** [Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage](/Sources.aspx?ID=189) pg. 62 **Perception** +30; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Kelish](/Languages.aspx?ID=38), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Osiriani](/Languages.aspx?ID=40), [Shae](/Languages.aspx?ID=71), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +37, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +35, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +30, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +30, [Shadow Plane Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +30, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +30, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +35 **Str** +4 **Dex** +9 **Con** +5 **Int** +6 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +9 **Shadow Shift** Being made partially of shadow themselves, shae are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) in [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=408) or [darkness](/Rules.aspx?ID=409) even to creatures that can see clearly in those light levels. **Items** _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ --- **AC** 41 **Fort** +27 **Ref** +33 **Will** +30 **HP** 339 **Immunities** precision **Resistances** [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27) 15, [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118) 15 **Counterattack** **Trigger** Ghiono is targeted by an attack from an adjacent creature that misses due to him being [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4); **Requirements** Ghiono is aware of the attack; **Effect** Ghiono makes a Strike against the attacker.
**Slip **Trigger** A creature moves adjacent to Ghiono** **Effect** Ghiono teleports to a clear space adjacent to another creature he can see within 30 feet. --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 35 feet; swift steps, tenebral form **Melee** _dagger_ +35 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 3d4+12 piercing plus 4d4 cold **Ranged** _dagger_ +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d4+12 piercing plus 4d4 cold **Occult Innate Spells** DC 37 - **Cantrips (9th)** [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66) - **4th** [Gaseous Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=129) (at will) - **7th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (self only; to [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) or [Material Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=1) only) **[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)** Ghiono deals an additional 4d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures. **Swift Steps** Ghiono's movement doesn't trigger reactions. **Tenebral Form** Ghiono can Fly at full Speed in gaseous form.
name: Ghiono

text: Ghiono Ghiono Source Pathfinder #186: Ghost King's Rage pg. 62 Perception +30; darkvision Languages Aklo, Common, Kelish, Necril, Osiriani, Shae, Undercommon Skills Acrobatics +35, Deception +37, Diplomacy +35, Occultism +30, Religion +30, Shadow Plane Lore +30, Society +30, Stealth +35 Str +4 Dex +9 Con +5 Int +6 Wis +6 Cha +9 Shadow Shift Being made partially of shadow themselves, shae are concealed in dim light or darkness even to creatures that can see clearly in those light levels. Items +2 greater striking dagger --- AC 41 Fort +27 Ref +33 Will +30 HP 339 Immunities precision Resistances cold 15, negative 15 Counterattack Reaction Trigger Ghiono is targeted by an attack from an adjacent creature that misses due to him being concealed; Requirements Ghiono is aware of the attack; Effect Ghiono makes a Strike against the attacker. Slip Reaction Trigger A creature moves adjacent to Ghiono Effect Ghiono teleports to a clear space adjacent to another creature he can see within 30 feet. --- Speed 25 feet, fly 35 feet; swift steps, tenebral form Melee Single Action dagger +35 (Agile, Finesse, versatile S), Damage 3d4+12 piercing plus 4d4 cold Ranged Single Action dagger +33 (Agile, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4+12 piercing plus 4d4 cold Occult Innate Spells DC 37 - Cantrips (9th) Chill Touch, Detect Magic - 4th Gaseous Form (at will) - 7th Plane Shift (self only; to Shadow Plane or Material Plane only) Sneak Attack Ghiono deals an additional 4d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures. Swift Steps Ghiono's movement doesn't trigger reactions. Tenebral Form Ghiono can Fly at full Speed in gaseous form.
